website_summaries.verdict: A great fiber supplement you can buy to treat general fiber needs or digestion issues.
pros: Fiber supplements contain a blend of superfoods to help with digestion health
Supplements are vegan safe and offer protein and omega-3 fatty acid
cons: Might take time to get used to unique, sand-like texture

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I've found a cure to chronic constipation!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic! I have been suffering from chronic constipation for the past year, I've tried literally EVERYTHING to help get me back to being regular and nothing worked. By chance, I came across a forum that recommended this so I thought I'd try it. Low and behold it worked! I will be taking this for the duration of my life! I really hope if you're suffering from constipation you give this a go, it has changed my life!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Modisette

customer_reviews.title: Third container... excellent results, helps manage weight too.
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. Half a scoop....not a whole one. I mix it into orange juice... shake it quick and down the hatch fast or it will turn to gel. FAST. Just tell yourself it's pulp instead of fiber. You'll be just fine. Works like a charm. I drink it before bed at night because sometimes it makes me feel bloated.... and I'd rather sleep throughout that feeling and wake up feeling awesome!!! Instead of drinking it in the morning and then feeling bloated all day. It's just what works for me. All around I just feel healthier and that's worth a little bloat until the magic fiber does it's job. Nothing's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Barefoot Scot

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!!!! I've been using it for a week now and any problems I have had with regularity are GONE. Fair warning: it is thick, but the taste really isn't bad. It's kind of like drinking the milk a bowl of unsweetened shredded wheat sat in. Last.l night I mixed it with vanilla what protein and it was better, but you do need to shake it every sip because the stuff will sink to the bottom. I HIGHLY recommend this product if you have problems with constipation. It's truly life changing!!!
customer_reviews.author: acorwith

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Garden of Life and use both the Probiotics and the Detoxifiber, however this product was terrible. First of all it tastes like sweet wallpaper paste. 16 oz of liquid is barely enough to make this quaffable and if you don't drink it quickly it totally congeals. If you are able to somehow ingest this slime, be ready for virulent flatulence followed by an anti-climactic soft BM. Make sure to have atleast 1/2 a roll of TP and wet wipes available. My wife who is obsessed with bowel health also found this product quite unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It’s organic fiber enough fiber as suggested requirements to provides bulk to form and facilitate passing of bowel movements! It works well! It has 120 calories. It goes down smoothly. Mixes easily with water or juice. Has a pleasant taste. I take it nightly produces Reg bowel movement by morning! I’m very satisfied with this product. Psyllium free. A great value for the money. Last for about a month and half. I use consistently.
customer_reviews.author: M Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: *Do you like flavorless congealed goop?
customer_reviews.text: This is among the most disgusting and disturbing things I've ever put in my mouth. The flavor, or lack there of doesn't help the texture. The texture, let me tell you is the most unsettling things about this product. Within seconds of mixing this with water, if you can mix it as it takes a blender to get this broken up properly, it congeals into a very jello like substance. Trying to down this makes me gag. The worst part is this doesn't work as advertised which is a real shame as other Garden of Life products are absolutely great! A real shame
customer_reviews.author: crazy4coral

customer_reviews.title: Only 10
customer_reviews.text: Wow. That’s a BIG scoop. This is my first experience with a drinkable fiber supplement but it wasn’t bad. I’m starting with half a scoop and may even use a tablespoon in the future to make this last longer. It’s a little expensive for only 10 servings. The taste reminds me of a bran muffin. Not sweet, but a pleasant nuttiness. I mixed it in a pint glass of water and added a bit more water to “rinse” the glass and get the last bits that stuck to the sides. Cheers! Here’s to being “regular”.
customer_reviews.author: SRUBYL

customer_reviews.title: SAVED MY INTESTINES
customer_reviews.text: I had come back from a mission trip to a 1st world country, but the food wasn’t the best for my tummy (so much oil). I was backed up for about a week and in pain and bloated. I took this every morning for a week and it helped get all of my backed up waste out of me. No joke, it’s great. I chug it with water or I put it in my vitamin powder drink and chug it. It thickens really quick so that’s why I don’t like it in protein drinks or yogurts (personally). It’s a texture thing for me. Would try it if you need more fiber and good bacteria in your colon.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand why this product scores so high. It does not dissolve in any liquid. As a solution, I started adding it to my oatmeal. I cannot go into details of what has happened to me after persevering for about 10 days. I basically have no control of my very loose stools. I don’t have the energy to send it back. Throwing it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Muturi

customer_reviews.title: I love the Fiber itself
customer_reviews.text: Only one complaint about the plastic jar itself. The wrapping on the outside. You have to take if all off. If you only take off the top outter wrapping then you can't unscrew the lid. The whole container spins around inside the label. To I have to write in Sharpie what is in this white plastic container. I love the Fiber itself. I put it in my fruit smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best out there 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I am recommending this to anyone. I did alot of research to find the best fiber without unnecessary ingredients & this is the one I chose. So far so good 👍🏼 Works very well for me, I was someone with severe Constipation after back surgery & this works extremely well for me! I've tried alot of fiber supplements & powders, this is the only one that has ever really helped me. It's actually been life changing for me. If you're thinking about fiber help give this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Bird 🐦

customer_reviews.title: I want so badly for this to be good because it seems so healthy but I've used it ...
customer_reviews.text: I want so badly for this to be good because it seems so healthy but I've used it 3 times and each time it has literally scratched the back of my throat and left me "phlegmy". It is so coarse and it doesn't mix well at all. That can't be healthy for digestive tracks that need rest and healing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Manning

customer_reviews.title: Texture is odd, but can be worked around. Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I've had constipation problems for quite some time. I've tried several fiber and constipation supplements, but nothing seemed to work past maybe 1 BM if I was lucky. I gave this a go and I'll admit it does suck up the moisture from anything I add it to. The best things I've tried were adding it to apple cinnamon oatmeal, peanut butter (which I put on apple slices) , and yogurt. When I added it to smoothies, it made them too thick to eat and sometimes clumpy. I've found ways around it's texture, and it's really helped me in the long run so I'd say it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Yes, Please

customer_reviews.title: It gets really thick before you are finished stirring it...difficult to drink
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Garden of Life vitamins. I am very disappointed in this product. It thickens up before you can finish stirring it. You have to drink it really fast and sometimes there are gooey clumps. Come on Garden of Life! You can do much better than that!
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQzzz

customer_reviews.title: Contains a high level of heavy metals
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this product. It is filled with heavy metals and possibly other contaminants. I only eat high quality organic and wildcrafted food, and I can always tell when I eat something that contains some sort of chemicals or heavy metals. I emailed garden of life to get testing data for the heavy metal content, and they refused to disclose that information. Once again, avoid this product and look elsewhere for a good fiber supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not really a drink but good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo you can’t really drink this stuff ..... toooooo thick .. but I make a paste and put it on toast or mix it with my oat meal and it taste really good!!!! And after a few days it did what it was meant to do . No gas or bloating . Love this !
customer_reviews.author: Verrette family

customer_reviews.title: First thoughts....I’ll keep you posted
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my first serving. I mixed it with hot water and a little honey. It did clump but I just smashed the clumps out with my spoon. The consistency and taste is that of Cream of Wheat or Malt o Meal that you put too much water in. I only did half a serving to see how my body will react. I’ll update after a week or so to let you know if this product works.
customer_reviews.author: CYK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for digestion and IBS
customer_reviews.text: I’ve dealt with ibs for over 2 years, and this immediately alleviated all of my symptoms. It’s magic. My digestion hasn’t been so consistently balanced in so long. Only a bit of bloating, but I remedied this with a cup of peppermint tea. The first time I tasted it I almost tossed the bottle. With the water suggestion it’s so THICK. My recommendation is half a scoop and 12 oz water in the AM, and another half +12oz in the PM. Adjust to your own needs, I am a 105 lb vegan woman eating about 1200kcal a day. Taste: nutty. Texture: gel like (just like chia or flax in water typically is) and slightly gritty. Drink with lots of water.
customer_reviews.author: MeaganEmily

customer_reviews.title: My new Fiber supplement
customer_reviews.text: I used to take metamucil as prescribed by a doctor but I was really lazy with my health and never read the ingredients. Never again. I love this stuff. Garden of life is a brand I really trust so I was delighted know they had a fiber supplement. I've been putting it into my protein pancakes and I just love it. For me personally, I can't put a full dose into my smoothies bc then they would clump up so I do about a third or half of the recommended dose.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for digestion, but doesn’t dissolve well in liquids
customer_reviews.text: The product itself has a subtle taste, kind of earthy, but it does not absorb into any liquid you try. It is a really good source of fiber and when I can get it into my system it definitely makes everything run more smoothly but if you try to drink the clumps like I have you’ll probably gag. I have to put it in the blender and mix it with fruits, etc. to make it palatable and it’s kind of time-consuming. But once again, it HAS helped with my digestive issues so in that sense it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works naturally!!
customer_reviews.text: Life changing! Had severe intenstinal infection in Feb. which caused digestion problems along with antibiotic bad reaction. This has helped naturally and I have felt great since taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jazz

customer_reviews.title: STOMACH PAIN
customer_reviews.text: This product did what it needed to do. It definitely made my bowel movements easier and more regular, however it caused this annoying and chronic dull pain in the upper right quadrant of my stomach. I figured maybe it was just my body getting used to the powder so I reduced the amount I was taking to half a cup. The pain still persisted nonetheless and I eventually had to quit taking it. Even after stopping usage of the powder, the pain still persisted for about a week before finally fading away. Although it works well, the unpleasant taste and the stomach pain is NOT worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce xiong

customer_reviews.title: drink water with product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this, one scoop a day for three years now and no longer have a problem with constipation this whole time. It also is very filling and I am not hungry. I take it in oatmeal with honey and fruit and almond milk. Drink tons of water with this product and use it every day. I feel better than I've ever felt since I was younger.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Slimey
customer_reviews.text: I’m not super impressed with this. First of all a scoop (serving size) is huge , I put it in a cup with 28 Oz of water and It was just all gel- like slime..... I don’t want it to go to waste so I just have a tablespoon of it in my 28 ounce cup... You still get some slime but I can manage to get it down. I won’t buy this particular product again
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Nasty stuff – don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: The photo I have included shows what happens when you stop storing the product. Another words you have to keep storing it while drinking. It’s very thick. It reminds me of what fiber drinks used to be like in the 80s. It’s so disappointing because I have this giant container to work my way through and I think it’s disgusting. I Purchased this product because my regular fiber was out of stock, and I like garden of life brand, but this is such a huge disappointment. Nasty stuff – don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Momalot

customer_reviews.title: Love drinking oatmeal?
customer_reviews.text: I had been used to mixing Benefiber in my morning coffee and thought I’d try something new. While this product is likely healthier, using it is a most unpleasant experience. It can only be mixed with water and does not dissolve. In fact, it actually gets thicker and I had to add more water halfway through. It’s basically like drinking watery oatmeal. If you’d like that, then you’ll like this. But my container’s been sitting on the counter unopened for a month.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fogelman

customer_reviews.title: Explosions - Not Just Egestive Ones
customer_reviews.text: As many reviews mention, the flavor is pretty bland and not great. I haven’t had many issues with the main use of the powder so that’s good. One issue that users should watch out for: Warning - don’t pre mix the powder in a water bottle and then forget about it/leave it closed for too long. The chia expansion and probiotics will pressurize the bottle until it explodes. If you think the taste is bad, the smell is even worse after this situation. Imagine the original taste digested, and then regurgitated on your ceiling. And walls. And bed. Pretty much everywhere. Hopefully just an uncommon user error but worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Karambatsakis

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Just don’t use a full scoop for a class of water unless you want to chew. The only downfall, which isn’t all that bad, is that when it is opened, the entire container packaging rips off, not just the part where you twist the lid to open. I now have a white container. Oh well, I’ll save it to store other stuff in it I guess
customer_reviews.author: Liane E.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fiber supplement I've ever taken and it has a very pleasant nutty flavor. I dump half a scoop in with a cup of milk and blend it up in my blender. Let it sit awhile and blend again. That seems to make some of the grittiness go away. Drink it fairly quickly though! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT BUT BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you use a lot of water with this product. It works great, but it needs to be stirred vigorously to break up lumps. And you have to drink it fairly quickly before it’s thickened beyond use. That said, it works great. No more IBD. WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rosenfield

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: This fiber powder has saved my life!! I swear by it doesn't have a specific taste and gross to drink but the benefits far outweigh the taste so worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Spiker

customer_reviews.title: Awful stuff
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't relieve constipation, it makes you gassy, bloated, constipated. The 7 grams protein is not worth the extra 130 calories. I only tried this because Amazon is out of the clear organic acacia fiber, which is awesome - no gas.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect (for me) all natural raw fiber supplement
customer_reviews.text: I recently changed over from Citrocell to this and it was the best change ever. It works so much better for me than the others. I love the nutty taste and actually look forward to drinking this every morning. More regular than ever!
customer_reviews.author: VinCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Mixing concrete is easier
customer_reviews.text: I have used several fiber products and this is the only one that I had to throw away the first time I tried to mix it with water and juice, first by hand and then with a powerful blender, all according to instructions. As a comparison, making and mixing concrete by hand - using any fluid - would be very easy, fun, and faster...
customer_reviews.author: Juan J. Morilla

customer_reviews.title: Beware of The Reviews
customer_reviews.text: This Raw Organic Fiber is the best. Has no taste & makes my smoothies thicker. The reviews for this product & Super Seed are mixed in together. Because of this I bought the Super Seed. All the bad reviews about taste & not mixing well belong to the Super Seed. Get the RAW ORGANIC FIBER. It does everything it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: First time using today. It worked fast, there was really no taste. I mixed with Orange juice. I may have put too much because it googed up, next time will use just one scoop as per instructions and see how it works. Drank some hot tea after. But for the most part, I like. Will try using with just water and see if I can get it down, but it appears to be flavorless.
customer_reviews.author: goodmovielover

customer_reviews.title: Maybe too much Fiber
customer_reviews.text: I love Garden of Life products, but this one simply wasn't cut out for me. After finishing up my fiber supplement I bought from my gym, I switched to this (just wanted to try something different). From the get go my stomach has been in knots and my wife hasn't appreciated the additional air freshener :-). In addition, I noticed that my shakes began to taste bland upon adding this. They normally taste sweet between the banana, strawberry, blueberries and honey. Needless to say, I switched back to my original fiber supplement and my body and wife are much happier. :-)
customer_reviews.author: agold

customer_reviews.title: Beneficial for Hirschsprung's
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our toddler's who has a rare gastrointestinal disease (Hirschsprung's) where controlling BM's can be an issue. While it hasn't helped with solidification yet (that is likely attributed to the condition), this is the only fiber product we've found so far that has made him fairly regular. Hence, fewer diaper rashes and a happy toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Pete D

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!! No hype!! Just Delivery!!! 🤸🏽‍♂️🤸🏽‍♂️🤸🏽‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: After buying tons of products to help w/IBS-C, this one delivers on first consumption, second, third and so forth! I add this to my smoothies in the morning! Non gassy, tasteless, and manageable to consume! I’m definitely reordering and will be taking this for the long haul maintenance to control my IBS-C! Please be sure to drink plenty of water to get things moving!
customer_reviews.author: Lass

customer_reviews.title: nothing wrong with fiber
customer_reviews.text: it gets stuck in my throat so i mixed it with orange juice and that helped a little but not so much with pooping. better than nothing though! you might have to eat a lot of it to get it going in your system.

customer_reviews.title: Garden of Life Lover...What Happened?!?
customer_reviews.text: I like Garden of Life products but this one missed the mark. It is challenging to dissolve even with a blender. The taste is less than desirable and I have tried many other fibers. It did work to keep my bowels flowing but there are other products that work just as well. (Renew Life).

customer_reviews.title: Super thick and slimey
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a way to get more fiber into my diet. Maybe it’s just me, but I cannot get this drink down, even with a smaller serving. I tried mixing with water and no matter Hiii quickly I mix and try to drink it globs up and gets super thick. I will have to try incorporating in a different way, maybe a smoothie? So far it has felt like a waste of money and the reviews looked really promising!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa B.

customer_reviews.title: I make a smoothie with this every day. Keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: I make a smoothie with this every day. Keeps me very regular with zero stomach/constipation issues since I've started using it. Half a scoop is completely sufficient. It's undrinkable in just water and can be very thick and unpalatable in oatmeal. Smoothie or just stirred in with some juice is the way to go.

customer_reviews.title: No, no, no!@!@!*****!!!!! No way!!!!

customer_reviews.text: I like adding fiber the meal replacement I already have through this brand I just wish it mixed up easier in Almond milk. it doesn’t seem to separate well and becomes a mass of chunks quick if I don’t drink immediately after mixing.

customer_reviews.title: it makes shakes undrinkable

customer_reviews.author: N. Strik

customer_reviews.title: Turns water solid
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars because its an all natural product but its extremely hard to consume, like other people have said it becomes solid super fast, the only way to drink is to chug it really fast or add more water half way through. Another way you might use this is to bake with it.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes pretty good and easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: It is a great fiber supplement. Great tasting. It gets thick when mixed with water but it is easy to swallow. I add a pack of EmergenC and it tastes great. I just use one scoop per day.
customer_reviews.author: Geno Z

customer_reviews.title: It takes getting used to
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels like beach sand. I tried it in a smoothy, only I don't drink them very often. Had to add more liquid as it thickened my drink. Can't seem to bring myself to use it any other way.
customer_reviews.author: Maeshawn

customer_reviews.title: Just wouldn’t dissolve
customer_reviews.text: Oh my. This was awful. I wanted to like it because of all the fiber. Terribly thick and gritty. I couldn’t get it palatable with a blender or trying to dissolve it in boiling water. It was like drinking sand.
customer_reviews.author: dar

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely going to be part of my daily ritual now. I’ve always had issues with constipation and I’m beyond over dealing with it. Within a few days of taking this I started having normal BMs again, no more bloated constipation tummy, no more cramping from being so backed up all the time. I just mix it in a cup with coffee creamer and it’s a sweet yummy dessert of sorts that I eat with a spoon! I look forward to taking it which has never been something I’ve said about constipation relief products!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Does a body good
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is intended to do without all the unnecessary toxic ingredients and sugars! We use a mini electric blender....I plan to purchase again when we run out.
customer_reviews.author: yes it's me

customer_reviews.title: Why the Container came almost Half Empty?
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me. I have to send back. I wonder why the container came with 1.77 Lbs which is equal 803g, when there is a lot room for more product? (It came almost half empty). Why not 2.00 pounds or 1,000g exactly?
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: All Natural Solution for Constipation
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for me on day one for constipation and regularity. It mixes well in a shaker cup and taste a bit nutty, not bad at all. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rhona

customer_reviews.title: Plan to drink a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: Taste is basically liquified Wheaties. It's not bad. Texture is the issue. It doesn't dissolve well at all. I found the only way I can take the recommended dose is to split it over two 16 oz glasses of water. If I put too much in one glass I will gag. it does not go down well. All in all, I feel it's helping...but you have to sacrifice.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R. Beaman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fiber Source
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears by this stuff. She uses it daily to achieve regularity. Other "fiber" items didn't work for her as well as this product. She highly recommends this RAW FIBER product
customer_reviews.author: elgreco

customer_reviews.title: Would not use whole scoop
customer_reviews.text: It does NOT mix well with smoothies or water I decided to try it again this morning in my smoothie and it made it disgustingly thick and grainy, it some how took away all he flavor from the fruit and no matter how much milk I added or how long I blended it it was still thick and grainy I could even drink it. The taste isn’t bad but the consistency is dreadful I suggest use half a scoop if you want it to be edible. I’m not sure how well it dissolves it warm and hot foods
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have a natural wheat flavor. Will get thick have to mix/dissolve in a full glass of water. Was baking and add a scoop to my banana bread for some extra fiber.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Its okay...
customer_reviews.text: This product works as expected, tastes ok (I just mix in water and chug it), and appears to be a quality product BUT; Its too expensive and produces quite a bit of uncomfortable gas and bloating. The gas and bloating may go away after a few days of continuous use, but I just want to use it once every few days or so and I don't know if I can put up with it. If I take it too close to bed time it disrupts my sleep. I do prefer it to psyllium husk though (which was too harsh and uncomfortable for my sensitive colon).
customer_reviews.author: Buzzy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Texture is gross but it works for pregnancy bowel issues
customer_reviews.text: I will start of by saying this stuff really works, one of the few things that actually help me to go. However it is very hard to choke down. There's really no flavor that I could sense but the texture leaves lots to be desired. It thickens almost immediately and doesn't really even dissolve completely. There's always chunks of it in the liquid so you basically have to chug it down ASAP because if not you'll need a spoon to finish. But again it worked when I was able to keep it down.
customer_reviews.author: Zen and Zeal

customer_reviews.title: Not good in drinks
customer_reviews.text: So not the tastiest stuff but I did like to eat it like cream of wheat. Didn't like it in my drinks so I would add some water and heat in microwave then add milk and stevia for flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Aceba

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Tastes terrible when mixed with water. I’ve only been able to ingest it via smoothie to hide the flavor. Seems to be a good supplement to incorporate.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does not mix well. Very thick in water

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't mix
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mix well, just like most of the other reviews say. Good I guess if your using it in a shake but I can see no way it mixes with water. customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This product really helped my husband, with better regularly, helped with bloating. It helped him with his stomach disease he has. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it Loved it Will keep buying
